title: LIVERPOOL FC font
content:
Hi friends

Please help me ID the font used for the LIVERPOOL FC crest

Thanks in advance

Hernando

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120419202755im_/http:/typophile.com/files/455px_liverpool_fc_n_logosvg_1195789102_3495.png)
author: hernandomiguel

comments.content: Slghtly modified [Albertus](http://web.archive.org/web/20120419202755/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/monotype/albertus_pro_virtual/?&sample_text=LIVERPOOL%20FOOTBALL) in the main part.
